talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Norfe$
Go. Fersen will show you the way.

$Norfe${action:Talk}
Be careful not to be swept away by this storm...
And remember… The Childs who know this location must not leave here alive!

$Gatekeeper Fersen${action:Talk}
This way! Wait!
Do not rush headlong into this storm! Wait for the signal!

$Gatekeeper Fersen$
Now!
※ Select [Continue] to move to the Western Secret Passage.

$Gatekeeper Fersen$
Be careful!
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Kali$
(Looking conflicted.)

$Gatekeeper Fersen${action:Talk}
You must be careful!
※Select [Continue] to move to the Western Secret Passage.

$Gatekeeper Fersen$
You must be careful!
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Child Hiver${action:Talk}{sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9934_sp_01.ogg}
Oh, it's you, {user_nick}.
Hehehe… Good work. You did exactly as I hoped.

${user_nick}$
… What?

$Child Hiver$
Since you told the residents of Blue Raven Territory to flee,
I was quite sure you would get the people of Rhadames to move in an attempt to save them.

${user_nick}$
(Damn… I was played!)

$Child Hiver$
Norfe really outdid himself with these defenses. This has been quite entertaining.
But in the end, I win no matter who dies. Good job, worm.

${user_nick}$
(Indeed… That makes sense. Rhadames in flames, and Childs dead in the process. It all works to her advantage
Damn it… I was played like a fiddle.)

$Child Hiver$
Oh, I just love seeing your faces like that!

$Gatekeeper Fersen${action:Talk}
You must be careful!
※Select [Continue] to move to the Western Secret Passage.

$Gatekeeper Fersen$
You must be careful!
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Child Hiver${action:Talk}{sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9934_sp_02.ogg}
It's been too long, everyone. Hehehe… Are you still fighting for good will and all that nonsense?

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9934_sp_01.ogg}
Sis-… You–how could you do this?!
How could you do this to Rhadames?!

$Child Hiver${sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9934_sp_03.ogg}
So, you can't even bear to call me sister now, even after I died for you?
I really should have just killed you long ago.

$Kali${sound:npc_Kali_qu9934_sp_01.ogg}
Hiver, please wake up! There is still hope for you!
We were together. You said you would always believe in us, no matter what.

$Girl in Black Clothing$
It was you? You're the one who attacked Aergal?!
… You won't get away with it!

$Child Hiver$
Hehehe… Hahahaha... HAHAHAHAHAHA!

$Child Hiver${sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9934_sp_04.ogg}
You guys sure know how to play the victim. I bet it would be nice to think that I'm the only villain in this story.
All you have to do is get rid of the evil Hiver and everything will be okay, right?

$Child Hiver${sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9934_sp_05.ogg}
You guys are all the same. But do you know who really destroyed Aergal?
It was the Red Child. That showoff Rubinart!
He's killed more than I ever have!

${user_nick}$
……!

$Kali${sound:npc_Kali_qu9934_sp_02.ogg}
What? No way. All that talk about the Red Child is just a rumor.
Rubinart would never do such a thing! What the refugees said about him…
It… was just… No, it couldn't be… And yet… Rubinart…

$Girl in Black Clothing${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9934_sp_01.ogg}
Stop it, Bewitching Hiver! Why are you doing this to Kali?
I don't know who this Rubinart is, but I trust Kali way more than you!

$Child Hiver${sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9934_sp_06.ogg}
Go see for yourself. I speak only the truth.
Who else would be able to destroy the ceiling of an underground city so tightly fortified?

$Child Hiver$
Do you really think there was a single Child in the Western Territory with that kind of power?
Me? Strong Blade Kaunos? No matter how strong he is, he wouldn't even come close.

${user_nick}$
No way… Just like with the Blue Clan…

$Kali${sound:npc_Kali_qu9934_sp_03.ogg}
Oh, if it isn't the Finest Stone Jade thief! What brings you here?

${user_nick}$
(Ugh, damn it!)

$Grele$
What? Finest Stone Jade thief?! {user_nick}, that was you?

$Gatekeeper Fersen${action:Talk}
You must be careful!
※Select [Continue] to move to the Western Secret Passage.

$Gatekeeper Fersen$
You must be careful!
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Child Hiver${action:Talk}
What's this? Grele knows you? Have you been doing some extracurricular activities?

$Norfe${action:Talk}
It's true that he stole the Finest Stone Jade by order of Commander Hwaran,
but {user_nick} is also the one who warned us that the Childs were about to attack Rhadames.

${user_nick}$
(… He knew everything this whole time? He may be a kid... But he sure is sharp.)

$Kali$
Norfe…(As if trying to bite her tongue.)
You knew that he was the thief, but you just let him be?

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9934_sp_01.ogg}
I've been watching him and trying to figure out what Hwaran is planning.
Even so, thanks to his warning, we were able to blow up the tunnel just in time.

$Grele$
I… I see. Then he helped us.

${user_nick}$
(This sly little fox, he finds a way to insult me and compliment me at the same time.)

$Child Hiver$
I'm starting to get bored. Are we done talking?
Hehe, shall we bring this to a crescendo?

$Gatekeeper Fersen${action:Talk}
You must be careful!
※ Select [Continue] to move to the Western Secret Passage.

$Gatekeeper Fersen$
You must be careful!
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Norfe${action:Talk}
Wait! Everyone watch out!

$Man Wielding a Greatsword${sound:npc_Quanos_qu9934_sp_01.ogg}
Hiver! Die!

$Child Hiver$
(Hiver's face stiffens. It seems she has met a tough opponent.)
… So Kaunos, you yet live.

${user_nick}$
(So this is the Strong Blade Kaunos Hwaran spoke of.)

$Kaunos${action:Talk}{sound:npc_Quanos_qu9934_sp_02.ogg}
Did you really think that I would take your bait?

$Child Hiver$
Tsk.

$Kaunos${sound:npc_Quanos_qu9934_sp_03.ogg}
Sneaky little fox. You may have eliminated Nephrite, but I am not such easy meat!
Your weakness was your undoing! Now die!

$Child Hiver$
It's true you are strong.
But you know, I've gotten pretty strong too.

$Gatekeeper Fersen${action:Talk}
You must be careful!
※Select [Continue] to move to the Western Secret Passage.

$Gatekeeper Fersen$
You must be careful!
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Kaunos$
Is that so? Then show me your might.
…!

$Blond-haired Boy${action:Talk}
I came here after hearing the explosions... What's with you guys?
Are you both Childs or something?

$Kali$
Geraint! Are you okay?

$Geraint$
Thankfully, I'm just fine. But… What's going on here?

$Child Hiver$
What… Who the heck are you?
(Hiver's voice shakes, though she tries to put on a confident front.)

$Geraint$
Who the heck am I? Who are you to speak to me like that?

$Child Hiver$
(Hiver glances at Kali, then flinches and steps backward.)
Tsk, I was getting bored anyway. See you all later.

$Kaunos${sound:npc_Quanos_qu9934_sp_04.ogg}
Where are you going? Do you think you can just run from me?

$Geraint$
… Shouldn't we go after her?

$Kali$
After Hiver! Quickly!

$Norfe$
Wait!

$Kali$
Norfe?

$Norfe$
The ground is unstable because of the explosion earlier.
We don't know when the cliff will collapse. Let's go back to Rhadames for now.

$Geraint$
Okay then. Back to Rhadames it is.
※ Select [Continue] to return to Rhadames.

$Norfe${action:Talk}
… Affairs have gotten more complicated.
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

$Gatekeeper Fersen${action:Talk}
Everyone is safe. That is the most important thing.

journal.title: Spur of the Moment
journal.contents:
There's no time to waste. Go to Gatekeeper Fersen like Norfe said.

Rhadames - Gatekeeper Fersen
journal.destination: Talk to Gatekeeper Fersen in Rhadames
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Gatekeeper Fersen and head to the Secret Passage.

journal.title: Amidst the Ashes
journal.contents:
The Childs rushed in, but in the end Rhadames was saved, and by a method even Norfe couldn't predict. Hiver walked toward you amid a pile of dead Childs on all sides.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.
※Speak to Gatekeeper Fersen to go to the Western Secret Passage.

Rhadames - Western Secret Passage (Hiver)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Hiver in the Western Secret Passage
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Hiver in the Western Secret Passage.

journal.title: Confirmation of Despair
journal.contents:
Hiver already predicted what {user_nick} would do. The party of Lagendian adventurers surrounds the chortling Hiver. All you can do is watch and see what happens next.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.
※ Speak to Gatekeeper Fersen to go to the Western Secret Passage.

Rhadames - Western Secret Passage (Hiver)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Hiver in the Western Secret Passage
journal.todo_msg: Kali seems to have something to say to Hiver.

journal.title: Unexpected Appearance
journal.contents:
Hiver says the Red Child, Rubinart, was the one who destroyed Aergal Kingdom. Everyone looks your way as they try to digest the shock of that statement. It seems Norfe has something to say.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.
※Speak to Gatekeeper Fersen to go to the Western Secret Passage.

Rhadames - Western Secret Passage (Norfe)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Norfe in the Western Secret Passage
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Norfe in the Western Secret Passage.

journal.title: Meet the New Enemy
journal.contents:
Suddenly an armored man wielding a greatsword appears. Who is this man?
※You cannot do this quest while in a party.
※Speak to Gatekeeper Fersen to go to the Western Secret Passage.

Rhadames - Western Secret Passage (Man Wielding a Greatsword)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Man Wielding a Greatsword in Western Secret Passage
journal.todo_msg: Talk to the Man Wielding a Greatsword in the Western Secret Passage.

journal.title: A Third Development
journal.contents:
A blond-haired boy suddenly appears and the two Childs on the verge of battle stop in their tracks and stare. What is happening now?
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.
※ Speak to Gatekeeper Fersen to go to the Western Secret Passage.

Rhadames - Western Secret Passage (Blond-haired Boy)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Blond-haired Boy in the Western Secret Passage
journal.todo_msg: Talk to the Blond-haired Boy in the Western Secret Passage.

journal.title: Back to Rhadames
journal.contents:
When Hiver saw the boy named Geraint, she immediately dropped everything and fled, with Strong Blade Kaunos chasing after her. Norfe stopped the party from trying to pursue the two because there was a risk the ground would collapse further. But surely a Child who knows the location of Rhadames shouldn't be left alive? Go back to Rhadames and speak with Norfe.

Rhadames - Norfe
